articles.title: Why superstar Alexia Putellas is one of the biggest X-factors in 2023 World Cup
articles.description: Ahead of Alexia Putellas' first game back for Spain, FOX Sports Research broke down her legendary résumé as well as her journey to this moment to show why she is the tournament's biggest mystery.
articles.content:
The 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup begins this week and one of the game's best players is set to make her return to the international scene. But a question lingers: What kind of impact will she have?
